Author: RosieNP
Text: Please talk to someone about your suicidal thoughts. People with EDs tend to be rather impulsive so you're at greater risk. It's important to get support. If you don't have a therapist or school counselor you feel comfortable with, call a hotline. The number for the Natural Suicide Hotline is 800-273-8255. If you Google them, there is also a text line if you don't want to call. Stay safe, okay?
